list.what is it?: A reconciliation of two separate websites necessitated by a merger. 100% custom WordPress theme based on a new brand refresh design system.
list.tech: Custom WordPress theme (PHP) using Advanced Custom Fields, Tailwind + Sass CSS, and AlpineJS.
list.workflow: Local by Flywheel, WP Engine, GitHub.
list.notes: Although this engagement took place at my time within an agency, I was the sole developer from start to finish.
